sentences.en: A natural killer cell is another type of lymphocyte.
sentences.cn: 自然杀伤细胞是另一种淋巴细胞.

sentences.en: CD 48 is a glycosylphosphatidylinositol - anchored protein inoled in lymphocyte adhesion, actiation, and costimulation.
sentences.cn: CD48因子是一种与淋巴细胞的黏附, 激活和聚集有关的一种以糖基磷脂酰肌醇为靶点的蛋白质.

sentences.en: Five patients with malignant hematonosis were received donor lymphocyte infusion ( DLI ) after transplantation .
sentences.cn: 对5例恶性血液病实施 供者 淋巴细胞输注.

sentences.en: It infects immune cells like this lymphocyte, causing their deaths and opening the door for opportunistic infections to swoop in.
sentences.cn: 它感染像淋巴细胞那样的免疫细胞，导致其死亡，并一举打开了由免疫系统缺失引起感染疾病的大门。

sentences.en: LHC could significantly increase hemolysin and lymphocyte transformation rate of mice.
sentences.cn: 明显增加小鼠血液溶血素,提高小鼠淋巴细胞转化率.

sentences.en: Lymphocyte is a kind of leucocyte of small volume.
sentences.cn: 淋巴细胞是一种体积较小的白细胞.

sentences.en: Medium - sized cell rate, lymphocyte rate, what thing is intermediate cell rate?
sentences.cn: 中型 细胞比率, 淋巴细胞比率, 中间细胞比率是什么东西 啊 ?

sentences.en: Method: To determine the withering rate of T lymphocyte by flow cytometer.
sentences.cn: 方法: 运用流式细胞仪测定豚鼠T淋巴细胞凋亡率.

sentences.en: Methods To observe lymphocyte transformation test after normal mouse taken Jieyongkang.
sentences.cn: 方法正常小鼠灌服疖痈康煎剂后,观察淋巴细胞转化试验.

sentences.en: Objective : To study engraftment kinetic for directing donor lymphocyte infusion ( DLI ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察移植物动力学变化,指导供者淋巴细胞输注 ( DLI ).

sentences.en: Objective To observe chromosomal aberrations and micronucleus in peripheral blood lymphocyte.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨放射工作人员外周血淋巴细胞染色体畸变和微核的变化.

sentences.en: Purpose To observe the anti - glioma effects of lymphocyte activated by SEC.
sentences.cn: 目的观察SEC活化的淋巴细胞对胶质瘤的杀伤作用.

sentences.en: The influence on the lymphocyte subclassification and IL - 2 of mice.
sentences.cn: 对小鼠及白细胞介素 -2 的影响.

sentences.en: The rearrangement genes of antigen acceptors of every lymphocyte are completely different.
sentences.cn: 因此每个淋巴细胞的抗原受体基因编码完全不同.

sentences.en: The resting lymphocyte population has been reported largely as the B series of lymphocytes.
sentences.cn: 依赖性淋巴细胞群已有大量报道,如B族淋巴细胞.

sentences.en: Their cervical lymph nodes were collected to assay the lymphocyte proliferation rate and the production of cancer killing cytokines.
sentences.cn: 收集子宫颈淋巴结，化验淋巴细胞增殖率和癌肿杀伤激动素的产生。

sentences.en: There was obvious correlation between erythrocyte immune function and T lymphocyte subsets.
sentences.cn: 红细胞免疫功能与T细胞亚群密切相关.

words.tran_cn: 淋巴球增多；淋巴球过多症
淋巴组织生成；淋巴细胞增殖

trans.tran_cn: （出现在血液、淋巴液中的）淋巴球，淋巴细胞
trans.tran_en: a type of white blood cell formed in lymphoid tissue
